title: Sabtu Bersama Bapak
overview: Sabtu Bersama Bapak shows the life journey and struggle of a husband and wife, Gunawan and Itje. Knowing that his death is imminent, Gunawan made a series of videos to accompany his two sons, Satya and Cakra. Gunawan instructed Itje to let the sons watch the videos he prepared every Saturday.
